details.notes: Traits: Mob Rule, Sturdy, Unnatural Strength (3), Unnatural Toughness (3). Skills: Athletics, Intimidate, Survival. Talents: Berserk Charge, Street Fighting, True Grit. Mob Rule: +10 WP per 5 Ork allies within 10m. Da Orkish Way: When making All Out Attack or Charge, gains +2 damage on first hit.

Traits: Fear (1), Mob Rule, Size (Hulking), Sturdy, Unnatural Strength (4), Unnatural Toughness (4). Skills: Athletics +10, Command, Intimidate +20, Survival. Talents: Berserk Charge, Crushing Blow, Iron Jaw, Swift Attack, True Grit. Might Makes Right: All Orks within 20m must obey or challenge the Nob. Challenge is a WS opposed test; loser takes 2d10+SB I damage.

Traits: Sturdy, Unnatural Strength (3), Unnatural Toughness (3). Skills: Athletics, Awareness, Intimidate +10, Navigate (Surface), Operate (Voidship), Survival. Talents: Berserk Charge, Hip Shooting, Two-Weapon Wielder (Ballistic). Flash Gitz: May fire two ranged weapons in the same turn without penalty.

Human inhabitants of Gregorn, hardened by constant warfare with Orks. Skills: Athletics, Awareness, Dodge, Survival +10. Talents: Rapid Reload, Resistance (Fear). Desperate Fighters: +10 WS and WP when outnumbered.

A massive, armoured predator native to Gregorn. Traits: Bestial, Brutal Charge (3), Deadly Natural Weapons, Natural Armour (3), Quadruped, Size (Hulking), Sturdy. Skills: Athletics +10, Awareness, Survival +20. Pack Instinct: +10 WS for every other Gula Beast within 5m.

Orks twisted by exposure to warp-tainted xenos artefacts on Vouxis Prime. Traits: Mob Rule, Sturdy, Unnatural Strength (3), Unnatural Toughness (3). Skills: Athletics, Intimidate, Survival. Warp-Touched: Immune to Fear caused by Daemons and warp phenomena. Roll 1d10 at start of each encounter: on a 1, the Ork gains a random mutation for the duration.

Massive Ork mutants warped beyond recognition. Traits: Berserker, Fear (2), Size (Hulking), Sturdy, Unnatural Strength (5), Unnatural Toughness (5). Skills: Athletics +10, Intimidate +20. Talents: Crushing Blow, Iron Jaw, True Grit. Warp Fury: On Critical damage, gains +10 WS and +2 damage for rest of encounter.

Apex predator of the death world Yanth. Traits: Bestial, Brutal Charge (4), Deadly Natural Weapons, Fear (2), Natural Armour (5), Size (Hulking), Unnatural Strength (4), Unnatural Toughness (3). Skills: Athletics +20, Awareness +10, Stealth +10, Survival +20. Alpha Predator: May charge through difficult terrain without penalty. On a successful Charge, target must pass Challenging WP test or be Stunned for 1 round.

An ambush predator that drops from above to engulf prey. Traits: Bestial, Chameleonic Skin, Crawler, Fear (1), Natural Armour (2), Toxic (3). Skills: Awareness +10, Stealth +30. Engulf: On a successful grapple, target is completely enveloped. Enveloped targets take 1d10+4 R damage per round (ignoring armour) from digestive acids.

Small, heavily-armoured insects that attack in swarms. Traits: Bestial, Crawler, Natural Armour (4), Size (Scrawny). Skills: Awareness, Stealth +10. Swarm: For every 3 additional beetles within 2m, attacks gain +1 damage. In groups of 10+, count as a single entity with combined wounds.

Traits: Eater of the Dead, Natural Weapons, Unnatural Agility (2). Skills: Acrobatics +10, Athletics, Awareness +10, Dodge, Navigate (Surface), Stealth +20, Survival +10. Talents: Furious Assault, Swift Attack. Fieldcraft: +20 Stealth in natural environments. Kroot may consume freshly dead enemies to gain fragments of their knowledge.

The leaders and spiritual guides of Kroot kindreds. Traits: Eater of the Dead, Natural Weapons, Unnatural Agility (3). Skills: Acrobatics +10, Athletics +10, Awareness +20, Command +10, Dodge +10, Navigate (Surface) +10, Stealth +20, Survival +20. Talents: Crushing Blow, Furious Assault, Lightning Reflexes, Swift Attack. Shaper's Guidance: All Kroot within 20m gain +10 WS and WP. Shape the Flesh: After eating a creature, the Shaper may direct genetic adaptations in the kindred.

Eldar Aspect Warriors specialising in close combat and infiltration. Traits: Fear (1), Shadow Strike, Unnatural Agility (3). Skills: Acrobatics +20, Athletics +10, Awareness +10, Dodge +20, Stealth +30. Talents: Ambidextrous, Assassin Strike, Lightning Attack, Swift Attack, Two-Weapon Wielder (Melee). Mandiblasters: At start of melee, inflict 1d10+2 E Pen 4 as a Free Action.

Eldar jetbike riders. Traits: Unnatural Agility (2). Skills: Awareness +10, Dodge +10, Operate (Aeronautica) +20. Talents: Hard Target. Jetbike: Tactical Speed 25, AB 12, Armour 15, Integrity 15. Twin-linked shuriken catapults mounted. Hit and Run: May fire and immediately move full speed as a single Full Action.

Eldar psykers who commune with the dead and guide Wraith constructs. Traits: Psyker (PR 5), Unnatural Agility (2), Unnatural Willpower (3). Skills: Awareness +20, Dodge +10, Forbidden Lore (Warp) +20, Psyniscience +30. Talents: Warp Sense. Psychic Powers: Telepathy, Divination. Spirit Guide: All Wraith constructs within 30m ignore Wraithsight penalties. Spirit Mark: Full Action; target enemy gains -20 to dodge Wraith construct attacks for 1d5 rounds.

Wraithbone constructs animated by Eldar spirit stones. Traits: Fear (2), Machine (10), Size (Hulking), Stuff of Nightmares, Unnatural Strength (5), Unnatural Toughness (5), Wraithsight. Skills: Awareness. Wraithcannon inflicts damage directly to the target's spirit.

Standard Dark Eldar foot soldiers. Traits: Dark-sight, Power from Pain, Unnatural Agility (2). Skills: Acrobatics, Athletics, Awareness +10, Dodge +10, Stealth +10. Talents: Rapid Reaction. Night Vision: No penalties from darkness.

Arena gladiators and close combat specialists of the Dark Eldar. Traits: Dark-sight, Power from Pain, Unnatural Agility (3). Skills: Acrobatics +30, Athletics +20, Dodge +30. Talents: Ambidextrous, Combat Master, Lightning Attack, Swift Attack, Two-Weapon Wielder (Melee). Dodge This: May test Dodge against melee attacks as a Free Action.

Elite Dark Eldar warrior-monks. Traits: Dark-sight, Fear (2), Fearless, Unnatural Agility (3). Skills: Acrobatics +10, Athletics +10, Awareness +10, Dodge +20, Parry +20. Talents: Crushing Blow, Lightning Attack, Swift Attack. Killing Strike: May spend a Full Action to make a single melee attack with +4 Pen and Felling (2).

Shadow-dwelling Dark Eldar connected to the warp. Traits: Chameleonic Skin, Dark-sight, Fear (2), From Beyond, Shadow Strike, Unnatural Agility (3). Skills: Acrobatics +20, Awareness +10, Dodge +10, Stealth +30. Talents: Assassin Strike. Balefire: As a Half Action, project a blast of dark flame: 1d10+4 E Pen 4 range 20m. Shrouded: Ranged attacks against Mandrakes suffer -30 unless the attacker can see in darkness.

Surgically modified servants of the Haemonculi. Traits: Dark-sight, Fear (1), Power from Pain, Unnatural Toughness (2). Skills: Awareness, Medicae +10. Talents: Resistance (Poison), True Grit. Acothyst Tools: Wrack melee attacks inflict Toxic (2). Resilient Flesh: Ignore first Critical wound each encounter.

The supreme ruler of a Dark Eldar Kabal. Traits: Dark-sight, Fear (3), Holo-field, Power from Pain, Unnatural Agility (4). Skills: Acrobatics +20, Athletics +10, Awareness +20, Command +20, Deceive +20, Dodge +30, Intimidate +30, Parry +20. Talents: Assassin Strike, Combat Master, Lightning Attack, Step Aside, Swift Attack. Soul Trap: On killing a foe, regains 1d5 wounds. Overlord: All Dark Eldar within 30m gain +10 WS and +10 BS.

Leader of a Wych Cult, the deadliest melee combatants among the Dark Eldar. Traits: Dark-sight, Fear (2), Power from Pain, Unnatural Agility (4). Skills: Acrobatics +30, Athletics +20, Charm +10, Dodge +30, Parry +30. Talents: Ambidextrous, Assassin Strike, Blademaster, Combat Master, Counter-Attack, Lightning Attack, Step Aside, Swift Attack, Two-Weapon Wielder (Melee). No Escape: Enemies may not Disengage from melee with the Succubus.

Dark Eldar flesh-sculptors and masters of agony. Traits: Dark-sight, Fear (3), Power from Pain, Regeneration (5), Unnatural Toughness (3). Skills: Awareness +10, Forbidden Lore (Xenos) +20, Medicae +30. Talents: Resistance (Poison), True Grit. Master of Pain: All Toxic effects from Dark Eldar weapons within 20m gain +1 to their Toxic rating. Reknit Flesh: As a Full Action, restore 1d10 wounds to a single Dark Eldar target within 5m.

Eldar Harlequins ‚Äî warrior-performers of the Laughing God. Traits: Fear (1), Fearless, Holo-field, Unnatural Agility (3). Skills: Acrobatics +30, Athletics +20, Awareness +10, Dodge +20, Perform +20. Talents: Ambidextrous, Assassin Strike, Combat Master, Lightning Attack, Swift Attack, Two-Weapon Wielder (Melee). Flip Belt: Ignores terrain and obstacles, may leap up to 6m vertically.

The commander of a Harlequin troupe, an unparalleled warrior-artist. Traits: Fear (2), Fearless, Holo-field, Unnatural Agility (4). Skills: Acrobatics +30, Athletics +20, Awareness +20, Command +10, Dodge +30, Perform +30. Talents: Ambidextrous, Assassin Strike, Blademaster, Combat Master, Counter-Attack, Lightning Attack, Step Aside, Swift Attack, Two-Weapon Wielder (Melee). Choreographer of War: All Harlequins within 20m gain +10 WS and +10 Dodge. Flip Belt: Ignores terrain and obstacles, may leap up to 6m vertically.

Harlequin heavy weapons specialists and avatars of death. Traits: Fear (2), Fearless, Holo-field, Unnatural Agility (3). Skills: Acrobatics +20, Athletics +10, Awareness +20, Dodge +20. Talents: Deadeye Shot, Marksman, Mighty Shot, Sharpshooter. Death is Not Enough: Killed enemies explode ‚Äî all within 3m take 1d10+2 E Pen 2. Flip Belt: Ignores terrain and obstacles, may leap up to 6m vertically.

Harlequin psykers who weave illusions across the battlefield. Traits: Fear (2), Fearless, Holo-field, Psyker (PR 5), Unnatural Agility (3), Unnatural Willpower (3). Skills: Acrobatics +20, Awareness +20, Deceive +20, Dodge +20, Forbidden Lore (Warp) +10, Perform +20, Psyniscience +20. Talents: Warp Sense. Veil of Tears: All enemies within 30m suffer -30 BS against Harlequins. Hallucinogen Grenade Launcher: 20m range, Blast (6), all within must pass Hard WP test or gain 1d5 Insanity and be Stunned for 1 round.

Winged Dark Eldar warriors surgically modified for flight. Traits: Dark-sight, Flyer (8), Power from Pain, Soaring, Unnatural Agility (2). Skills: Acrobatics +10, Awareness +20, Dodge +10. Talents: Hard Target. Skyborne Assault: May fire while flying without penalty. Deep Strike: On arrival, enemies must pass Awareness test or be Surprised.

Serpentine xenos mercenaries employed as bodyguards by Dark Eldar Archons. Traits: Fear (1), Multiple Arms (4), Natural Armour (3), Size (Hulking), Unnatural Strength (3), Unnatural Toughness (2). Skills: Athletics +10, Awareness +10, Dodge, Parry +10. Talents: Ambidextrous, Swift Attack, Two-Weapon Wielder (Melee, Ballistic). Bodyguard: May intercept attacks targeting the Archon within 3m.

Monstrous creations of the Haemonculi, surgically modified beyond recognition. Traits: Berserker, Fear (2), Size (Hulking), Unnatural Strength (4), Unnatural Toughness (4). Skills: Athletics. Talents: Crushing Blow, True Grit. Rampage: Gains +1 attack per round for each enemy killed in the current encounter (max +3). Liquefier Gun: As a Half Action, spray 10m cone, 1d10+4 E Pen 2, ignores armour.

Dark Eldar jetbike riders who slash through enemy formations. Traits: Dark-sight, Power from Pain, Unnatural Agility (2). Skills: Acrobatics +10, Awareness +10, Dodge +10, Operate (Aeronautica) +20. Talents: Hard Target. Reaver Jetbike: Tactical Speed 25, AB 12, Armour 12, Integrity 12. Bladevane: When flying over enemies, inflict 1d10+3 R Pen 2 on each enemy passed over.
